Articles.Content:
So I'm trying to launch a satellite into polar orbit. (grinding to do a mun landing). I put the rocket out on the pad, enable SAS and go to map view to warp to a better launch plane. Upon returning to the pad, SAS is still on but the space bar won't work, and I can't launch the rocket. Is this a bug? Anyone else run into this? What is up?

Edited May 7, 2015 by Trenchfoot
If you time-warped and you did not have your rocket connected with the red stands than most likely you've run out of electricity.

Are you sure you didn't simply forgot to stop time-warp ?

Edited May 6, 2015 by Gaarst
Maybe it ist this sticky launchpad bug? Did you try the Stock Bug Fix Modules mod from the addons section of the forums.

@ Guitarxe

Oh! But aren't you smart. Facepalm. Thanks!

*edit* No I ran out of juice. Probe body only holds 10...
